text: Ichsan Kurniawan (born 24 December 1995) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Liga 2 club Muba BaBel United. == Club career== He made his Sriwijaya first-team debut on 18 September 2013 as starting line-up, which ended 6–1 defeat against Barito Putera at Demang Lehman Stadium. == Career statistics == === Club === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Piala Indonesia !colspan="2"|Asian !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- | rowspan=4|Sriwijaya |2013 | rowspan=3|Indonesia Super League |1||0||colspan=6|—||1||0 |- |2014 |0||0||colspan=6|—||0||0 |- |2015 |2||0||colspan=6|—||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !3!!0!!colspan="6"|—!!3!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !3!!0!!colspan="6"|—!!3!!0 |} ==References== == External links == * * Ichsan Kurniawan at Liga Indonesia * Category:Indonesian footballers Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Sriwijaya FC players Category:Sportspeople from South Sumatra Category:Indonesia youth international footballers Category:Indonesia international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Ichsan Kurniawan
